text: @thugugbob ah...history theme games...the only place you will find gamers talking deep in history :P
author: sonicspeedx13

text: @devilhunterred The Huns are one of many reasons. The Imperial economy was in trouble, mass barbarian migrations occured, and a series of terrible emperors are only a few reasons for the fall of the Empire. You really can't pin it on one group.
author: Flamefang

text: @devilhunterred Well yes, it was the sole superpower because its European counterpart fell. Rome was superior to the Han Empire in its day but its fall was far.
author: Flamefang

text: @devilhunterred China is a powerful country which fell upon hard times. It is now making the slow climb from those times into what will hopefully be a bright future. However i would warn you from putting too much hope in your nation. After all, regardless of China's might it cannot oppose the world. The Chinese government needs to learn that becoming a super power comes with certain responsibilities. Responsibilities to the people.
